meanings.definition: The state of being without land.
meanings.sent1: Many people in the city face landlessnesses due to high property prices.
meanings.sent2: The landlessnesses of the refugees were a result of displacement from their homes.
meanings.sent3: The landlessnesses of the tiny ants led them to build their homes in the grass.
meanings.sent4: In the vast desert, the endless landlessnesses seemed to stretch into eternity.
meanings.sent5: The landlessnesses of the nomadic tribes forced them to constantly move in search of new pastures.

meanings.definition: The condition of lacking land ownership.
meanings.sent1: The landlessnesses of the tenants made them vulnerable to sudden eviction.
meanings.sent2: Landlessnesses among the indigenous communities were a result of historical injustices.
meanings.sent3: The landlessnesses of the birds led to fierce competition for nesting spots.
meanings.sent4: In the bustling city, the landlessnesses of space made finding a parking spot a challenge.
meanings.sent5: The landlessnesses of the garden left no room for new plants to grow.
